title: Powered Credit Assessment Engine to Drive SME Growth
description: Singapore, October 29: Choco Up, Asia's leading growth financing platform, has unveiled a new Artificial Intelligence (AI)-powered Credit Assessment Engine designed to help small- and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) access growth capital faster and more efficiently. Rolled out this month, the enhanced process shortens the end-to-end process, from when the request for financing is received to when funds are deployed, from days to hours to minutes.

title: ‘Not Real Work’: Sam Altman’s Remark On AI Replacing Modern Jobs Sparks Debate-Watch Video
description:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has reignited the debate over what counts as real work amid rising fears over job losses to artificial intelligence (AI). Speaking at an event recently, he compared modern jobs to those of a farmer 50 years ago and suggested many current roles might not seem like “real work” to past generations.
Critics argued that Altman’s remarks dismiss people in vulnerable or low-paid jobs as the influence of automation grows.
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman has reignited the debate over what counts as real work amid rising fears over job losses to artificial intelligence (AI). Speaking at an event recently, he compared modern jobs to those of a farmer 50 years ago and suggested man... [1674 chars]

title: Nvidia-Nokia partnership marks new phase in global tech collaboration
description: Nvidia will invest $1 billion to acquire a 2.9% stake in Nokia, marking a strategic collaboration aimed at advancing artificial intelligence and data centre technologies. The partnership signals a major step toward building AI-driven telecom infrastructure and next-generation 6G networks. (Source: Reuters) Nvidia Buys 2.9% Stake in Nokia for $1 Billion
content: Nvidia will invest $1 billion to acquire a 2.9% stake in Nokia, marking a strategic collaboration aimed at advancing artificial intelligence and data centre technologies. The partnership signals a major step toward building AI-driven telecom infrastr... [2679 chars]

title: The Human Side of Korea’s AI Boom: Jobs, Skills, and the Quest for Equality
description: The OECD–KDI–KEIS report on Artificial Intelligence and the Labour Market in Korea explores how AI is transforming jobs, skills, and inequality in one of the world’s most tech-driven economies. It urges a human-centred transition that couples innovation and productivity with inclusive education, fair adaptation, and ethical governance.
content: The report “Artificial Intelligence and the Labour Market in Korea,” prepared by the OECD, Korea Development Institute (KDI), and the Korea Employment Information Service (KEIS), delivers an incisive look at how artificial intelligence is reshaping e... [4899 chars]

title: Trump says may speak to China's Xi about Nvidia's 'super-duper' Blackwell chip
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he will speak to Chinese President Xi Jinping about Nvidia's state-of-the-art Blackwell artificial intelligence chip at their expected meeting on Thursday.
content:
Sales of the U.S. firm's high-end AI chips to China have been a key sticking point in protracted trade talks between the world's two largest economies this year.

title: Amazon may slash up to 1,000 jobs in India under global cuts, says report - which departments will be impacted?
description: Amazon plans to cut 800 to 1,000 corporate roles in India as part of a global workforce reduction amid increasing use of artificial intelligence. The layoffs will affect various departments including marketing, human resources, tech etc.
content:
Amazon may cut nearly 800 to 1,000 corporate roles in India as part of the e-commerce giant's plans to reduce its global workforce, according to a report by The Economic Times, citing people aware of the development.
